mapper.insert: /* 자격증과목 등록 */ INSERT INTO license_subject ( ls_code ,li_code ,ls_subject ,ls_name ,ls_reg_id ,ls_reg_datetime) VALUES (#{lsCode}, #{liCode}, #{lsSubject}, #{lsName}, #{lsRegId}, CURDATE());
mapper.select: /* 자격증과목 목록 조회 */ SELECT ls.ls_code ,ls.li_code ,ls.ls_subject ,ls_name ,ls_reg_id ,ls_reg_datetime FROM license_subject AS ls;
